name: Moving On (oa5f)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47. Theme: Stuck in a Loop.

Controls:

WASD - MOVE

MOUSE - Look Around

[E] or [Mouse 0 (left click)] - Interact

[P] - Pause

Source Code: https://github.com/oa5f/LudumDare47

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/moving-on
